MineGrid.title: Mine Grid
MineGrid.instructions: üî¥ Tap a tile to make it red. Tap red again to explode row & column.
MineGrid.description: This grid helps you mine in the most efficient way. Since any unopened tile might be a bomb, you should always choose the tile whose explosion would clear the greatest number of currently available tiles.
